text.__SUMMARY__:
Lonchocarpus phaseolifolius is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, and Nicaragua.
text.Sources: Nelson, C. (1998). "Lonchocarpus phaseolifolius". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T37452A10056749. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T37452A10056749.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
